prTitle: feat: create Link component with React Router integration
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented Link component (task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-9) with React Router integration and comprehensive variant support.

### Features Implemented

✅ **Link.jsx wraps React Router Link for internal navigation**
- Automatically detects internal vs external links
- Uses React Router's Link component for internal navigation
- Renders as anchor tag for external links

✅ **External links automatically get target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'**
- Detects external URLs (http/https)
- Handles mailto: and tel: links
- Adds security attributes automatically

✅ **Link.module.css implements variant styles using color variables**
- `default` variant: Standard link appearance
- `button` variant: Button-like styling with hover effects
- `nav` variant: Navigation menu styling
- Uses CSS custom properties for theming

✅ **Focus and hover states clearly visible**
- Accessible focus outlines
- Smooth transitions
- Support for prefers-reduced-motion
- High contrast mode support

✅ **Component maintains proper accessibility attributes**
- Proper PropTypes validation
- ARIA attributes support
- Keyboard navigation
- Screen reader compatible

### Project Setup

- React + Vite project configuration
- CSS Modules support
- Comprehensive test suite with Jest + Testing Library
- Demo application showcasing all variants
- PropTypes validation

### Testing

- 9/9 tests passing
- All acceptance criteria verified
- External link detection
- Variant class application
- Accessibility attributes
- Custom className support

### Usage Examples

```jsx
import Link from './components/ui/Link';

// Internal navigation
<Link to="/about">About Us</Link>

// External link (automatic security attributes)
<Link href="https://example.com">External Site</Link>

// Button variant
<Link to="/signup" variant="button">Sign Up</Link>

// Navigation variant
<Link to="/products" variant="nav">Products</Link>
```

Closes #90
